channel.title: NRS3 Compiling error & Client Class
channel.description:
Hello there, I have been working on NrS3 for fun as of recently, I've been trying to find a client to test it out and I've found 3 clients so far but it seems like they all have a Virus.. /: The minute I download them and extract the folder from the (Archive) my AVG detects it and pops up.
Here's what it shows me; [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2ujrsdu.pn[/img]
I hope someone can tell me what that is and if it's an actual virus or not?
Now, after compiling my server, I'm getting a TriviaBot Error. I thought you just had to add the "Com/Import" to somewhere? But i'm not completely sure.
Here's a picture of the compiler error I've been getting; [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/v30ny9.jpg[/img]
I hope someone can help me, any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.
